#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
int check(int a[],int b[],int size);
using namespace std;
int main(){
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
       int n;
       scanf("%d",&n);
       int *a=new int[n];
       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
         scanf("%d",&a[i]);
         int *b=new int[n];
         int sum=32267;
         for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
             b[i]=a[i];
             int j=i+1;
             int c=a[i];
             while(j<n){
                    c++;
                    b[j]=c;
                    j++;
                   }
         int k=i-1;
          int d=a[i];
         while(k>=0){
            d--;
            b[k]=d;
         k--;
         }
       /*  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
           cout<<b[i]<<" ";
           cout<<endl;    */
         int res=check(a,b,n);
         if(res<sum)
            sum=res;
         }
         printf("%d\n",sum);
          delete []a;
          delete []b;
   }

    return 0;
}
int check(int a[],int b[],int size){
        int count=0;
       for(int i=0;i<size;i++){
          if(a[i]!=b[i])
              count++;
       }
        return count;
}
